title: Bug 123044 - Preview attached file in PDF, page break missing in the first item
description: Description: Preview attached file in PDF, and the page break in the first item didn't happen. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the expected page break in the first item did not occur.
EB: The first item in the PDF preview should display a page break as intended.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the attached file in PDF. 2. Navigate to the first item. 3. Observe that the page break is missing.
